title: The Mystery of the Mass
itunes:title: The Mystery of the Mass
description: The sixth chapter of John's Gospel, from which we will be reading these next several weeks, is a sustained meditation on the meaning of the Mass and the Eucharist. Our passage for today, when read symbolically, illumines the major movements of the Mass.

itunes:author: Bishop Robert Barron
